Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review the sound production timeline.
Begin creating rough prototypes for key sound effects (e.g., gunfire, footsteps).
Break. Listen to the prototypes and make notes for improvements.
Refine the sound effect prototypes based on notes.
Email @lvdn-1 to discuss level-specific sound requirements.
Adjust sound effect prototypes based on feedback from @lvdn-1.
Start sketching rough ideas for background music tracks.
Review and organize all sound prototypes and music sketches.
